entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
